biotools.summary:
A web server tool to incorporate 'homologous' water molecules into GPCR structures.

Program to incorporate internal water molecules to GPCR models.

A free access tool to incorporate internal water molecules to GPCR structures.

available at http://lmc.uab.cat/homolwat.
